member.name: T:DromundKaas.Entity
member.summary: Abstract Entity class to be extended by both Players and Enemies.

member.name: F:DromundKaas.Entity.ID
member.summary: Current Entity ID.

member.name: F:DromundKaas.Entity.Life
member.summary: Remaining life to the entity.

member.name: F:DromundKaas.Entity.Location
member.summary: Location of the entity (top left corner of the sprite).

member.name: F:DromundKaas.Entity.Color
member.summary: Color of the entity.

member.name: F:DromundKaas.Entity.Type
member.summary: Type of Entity.

member.summary: Default Entity builder for all in-class parameters.

member.name: T:DromundKaas.Enemy
member.summary: Enemy class to hold additional parameter of Step (int).

member.name: F:DromundKaas.Enemy.Step
member.summary: Current step in the Enemy's movement path.

member.summary: Default Entity builder for all in-class parameters.

member.name: T:DromundKaas.Player
member.summary: Player class to extend Entity.

member.summary: Default Entity builder for all in-class parameters.

member.name: T:DromundKaas.Bullet
member.summary: Bullet class to hold Bullet entity instances. Has an additional field for Friendliness.

member.name: F:DromundKaas.Bullet.Friendly
member.summary: True if it is a bullet friendly to the player. False if it is an enemy bullet.

member.name: M:DromundKaas.Bullet.#ctor(System.UInt32,System.Int32,DromundKaas.Point,DromundKaas.EntityType,System.ConsoleColor,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Default Entity builder for all in-class parameters.

member.name: T:DromundKaas.EntityType
member.summary: Type of Entity. To be stored as unique values in the Main module.

member.name: F:DromundKaas.EntityType.Name
member.summary: Default Entity name.

member.name: F:DromundKaas.EntityType.Sprite
member.summary: Default Entity image, as a character matrix.

member.name: F:DromundKaas.EntityType.MaxLife
member.summary: Maximum life for Entity type by default.

member.name: F:DromundKaas.EntityType.Movement
member.summary: Default movement instructions of Entity type - udlr_@

member.name: F:DromundKaas.EntityType.Blasters
member.summary: The locations of the blasters, relative to the main Location of the Entity.

member.name: M:DromundKaas.EntityType.#ctor(System.String,System.Char[0:,0:],System.Int32,System.String,DromundKaas.Point[])
member.summary: Default EntityType constructor for all in-class parameters.
member.param: The Name of the Entity Type.
The character image of the Entity Type.
The default maximum life of the Entity Type.
The default movement pattern of the Entity Type.

member.name: M:DromundKaas.EntityType.CompareTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares two EntityTypes by name.

member.name: M:DromundKaas.EntityType.ExtractData(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,DromundKaas.EntityType})
member.summary: Extracts all data from the EntityTypes.dk file into a HashSet of EntityTypes.
member.param: The target to hold all the EntityTypes.

member.name: T:DromundKaas.Utils
member.summary: Utility function class.

member.name: M:DromundKaas.Utils.IsValidPoint(DromundKaas.Point)
member.summary: Checks whether given Point is within the confines of the Console screen.

member.summary: Print given entity to the console.

member.name: M:DromundKaas.Utils.MoveEntity(DromundKaas.Entity,System.Char)
member.summary: Move given entity in given direction. Modifies the Entity Location parameter.
member.param: Direction in which to move the entity. Accepted directions: 'u' (up), 'd' (down), 'l' (left), 'r' (right).
